title: ALIENATED : The Seven Deadly Emotions of Parental Alienation Syndrome
description: Parental Alienation is child abuse. Some have even argued it is legalized child abuse because the courts refuse to come near it and mental health professionals only meet it with a moderate acceptance.It is a problem plaguing women and men alike in every country throughout the world. ALIENATED explores the seven most experienced emotions people have on their journey through PAS and helps them navigate through.Your emotional health, attitude and perspective on life are your keys to surviving alienation as you travel through the rest of your journey. It is the difference between a life of self destruction and a life of victory, hope and love. It is the key to self-forgiveness and the forgiveness or others.
author: Gerry Van Mansfeld
